SELECT t2.id FROM o_agent_cre_user t1 LEFT JOIN cre_user t2 ON t1.cre_user_id = t2.id where t1.agent_id=#{agentId}

select t2.id,t2.user_phone FROM o_agent_cre_user t1 LEFT JOIN cre_user t2 ON t1.cre_user_id = t2.id where 1=1 and user_phone like #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t1.agent_id=#{agentId}
SELECT count(1) from api_acount_info a INNER JOIN cre_user c on c.id = a.cre_user_id and c.delete_status = '0' where (a.name = #{userName} or c.user_phone = #{userName}) and a.delete_status = '0'
